import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Card,Badge,Space,Typography}from'antd';import*as microsoftTeams from'@microsoft/teams-js';import SuggestionPanel from'../components/SuggestionPanel';import{getPlatformFeatures}from'../utils/mockData';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const{Text,Title}=Typography;export default function TeamsApp(){const[teamsContext,setTeamsContext]=useState(null);const[isConnected,setIsConnected]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{microsoftTeams.app.initialize().then(()=>{setIsConnected(true);console.log('Teams initialized');// Simulate getting Teams context
setTimeout(()=>{setTeamsContext({meetingId:'teams-meeting-456',chatId:'team-chat-789',userRole:'organizer',meetingType:'Scheduled'});},1000);}).catch(error=>{console.error('Teams initialization failed:',error);});},[]);const platformFeatures=getPlatformFeatures('teams');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:16},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card,{style:{marginBottom:16},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Space,{direction:"vertical",style:{width:'100%'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Space,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Title,{level:3,style:{margin:0},children:"\uD83D\uDCBC Microsoft Teams Assistant"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Badge,{status:isConnected?'success':'error',text:isConnected?'Connected':'Disconnected'})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Space,{wrap:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{type:"secondary",children:"Platform: Microsoft Teams"}),teamsContext&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{type:"secondary",children:"\u2022"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Text,{type:"secondary",children:["Meeting: ",teamsContext.meetingId]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{type:"secondary",children:"\u2022"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Text,{type:"secondary",children:["Role: ",teamsContext.userRole]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Space,{wrap:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{style:{fontSize:12},children:"\u2705 Calendar integration"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{style:{fontSize:12},children:"\u2705 Channel integration"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{style:{fontSize:12},children:"\u2705 Meeting context"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{style:{fontSize:12},children:"\u2705 Participant data"})]})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SuggestionPanel,{platform:"teams"})]});}
